casebody.data:
HIGH VOLTAGE ENGINEERING CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. POTENTIALS, INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 74-2367. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Aug. 27, 1975. H. Lee Godfrey, Austin, Tex., Henry C. Nields, Boston, Mass., for plaintiff-appellant. James H. Keahey, Austin, Tex., for defendant-appellee.

Before TUTTLE, GODBOLD and MORGAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed on the opinion of the District Court, 398 F.Supp. 18 (W.D.Tex. 1974).
